sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; export default function Main() { const [Meme, setMeme] = React.useState({ TopText: "One does not simply", BottomText: "Eat a grilled cheese", Img: "http://i.imgflip.com/1bij.jpg" }) function updateTopText(event){ const {value} = event.currentTarget setMeme(prevMeme => ({ ...prevMeme, TopText: value })) } return (
{Meme.TopText} {Meme.BottomText}
) }
